siminov.web.adapter.handlers

Class SiminovHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • siminov.connect.Siminov
      • siminov.web.Siminov
        • siminov.web.adapter.handlers.SiminovHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdapter, IHandler

    public class SiminovHandler
extends Siminov
implements IAdapter, IHandler
    This actually deals with Request Handling Between WEB-TO-NATIVE and NATIVE-TO-WEB.
